title: Font ID please : 50s movie ???
content:
hi there, I need know the name of the font of the title of the movie of 1956 “THE VIOLENT YEARS”

[http://www.mst3ktemple.com/images/610-violent\_years.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720063125/http:/www.mst3ktemple.com/images/610-violent_years.jpg "http://www.mst3ktemple.com/images/610-violent\_years.jpg")

HELP PLEASE!!!!!!!

 [‹ From Polish constructivist manifesto 1923](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720063125/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43075 "Go to previous forum topic") ['A'vant garde ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720063125/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43072 "Go to next forum topic")
author: italcrome

comments.content:
Ahem. One exclamation or question mark will do.

Like many posters of the era, this is hand drawn or painted.

Here are some alternatives:

[Agent of the Uncanny](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720063125/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=DET0000284)  
 [Destination Unknown](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720063125/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=DET0000287)  
 [B-Movie Retro](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720063125/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typonauten/b-movie-retro/?refby=typographica)  
 [Flash](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720063125/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/urw/flash/)
a few decades earlier, but also kinda pulpy and painty [Reporter 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720063125/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/reporter-2/)
To share? I think you’re in the wrong forum. We don’t trade warez here.
Yeah, someone remove his post maybe? That’s, what do you call it... ’illegal’.

I buy the font package... I ask if any have it for test... that site dont have tester, if the same if anybody send me I cant use... beacuse I need for a commercial thing and I need rights.

thanks
